duties_responsibilities.duty: Expertise in instrument interface setup, including interfaces through Data Innovations (DI) and directly to Sunquest.
Specialization in reference flag interfaces and monitoring instrument and interfaces error logs.
Building new tests or migrating existing tests, with a focus on automating the tests.
Troubleshooting expertise in HL7 and working with instruments with event flagging, notifications to clients.
Working on calculations within Sunquest related to flags and reference ranges, with a specific focus on the Hematology Department.
Ownership of the entire process from package delivery to rollout.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field (Master's preferred)
